The Challenge Network
Hours Logging Form
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} & {!Contact.Parent_Name__c}
Please find below a link to the form needed to log your volunteering hours. You can use this form to submit hours multiple times if needed. When you have submitted all of the hours you need to make up our programmes team will arrange for your certificate to be sent to you.
If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to call us on 0330 111 0101.
Kind Regards
The Challenge
